metadata.title: CVE-2020-22026 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: Buffer Overflow vulnerability exists in FFmpeg 4.2 in the config_input function at libavfilter/af_tremolo.c, which could let a remote malicious user cause a Denial of Service.

criterions.comment: ffmpeg package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.3').
